title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should not be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog
OB: The selected bookmark is being saved in the xml source when a drill through link is created. However, it should not be saved and should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
EB: Bookmark link set in drill through link is saved in the xml source when it should not be. The expected behavior is to display the target bookmark in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR: To reproduce the bug: 1. Define a drill through link with a target bookmark selected. 2. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog and observe that the selected bookmark is saved in the xml source, instead of being displayed in the dialog.
